thread.title: Summer's Silver Lining Lives At Orlando World Center Marriott This Labor Day WeekendTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Summer's Silver Lining Lives At Orlando World Center Marriott This Labor Day WeekendTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Summer's Silver Lining Lives At Orlando World Center Marriott This Labor Day WeekendTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Summer’s Silver Lining Lives At Orlando World Center Marriott This Labor Day Weekend Published on : Wednesday, August 19, 2015
As the sun sets on summer, Orlando World Center Marriott invites friends and families to say yes to one last hoorah with a Labor Day escape that will save 35 percent.
The Orlando resort is offering the Labor Day Weekend Getaway Package with deluxe accommodations starting at $129 per night for stays Sept. 2-7, 2015, in addition to complimentary self-parking. A number of special events are planned at the hotel for the holiday weekend, including live entertainment at the pool, a golf clinic and movie nights.
Additionally, to build excitement and encourage travelers to find summer’s silver lining, the family resort near Walt Disney World® offers those looking to savor the last moments of the sunny season to enter the “Celebrate Summer” contest at www.facebook.com/worldcenter by Aug. 23, 2015, for the chance to win big. One weekly prize winner will be selected at random to receive a two-night stay for two, plus one lucky grand-prize winner will receive a five-night stay for four. Entrants can also check out the resort on Twitter and Instagram for more ways to enter each week.
Towering above more than 200 prime, Central Florida acres, the four-diamond resort offers experiences that are a “world beyond compare.” Still basking in the glow of an extensive multi-million dollar transformation, Orlando World Center Marriott now features everything from the iconic Falls Pool Oasis — ranked one of the world’s coolest hotel pools by Forbes — with enticing enrichments inclusive of a Slide Tower featuring two, 200-foot winding waterslides and one 90-foot speed water slide. The Orlando hotel with waterslides also boasts a Splash Zone offering kids a zero-entry pool and playground, as well as a Kid’s Activity Zone and Poolside Bar and Grill. Other amenities include the championship golf course and Bill Madonna Golf Academy at Hawk’s Landing Golf Club, a full-service spa and fitness center, and 10 restaurants and lounges, including a food court for guests on the go.
With the year-round average temperatures around 78 degrees Fahrenheit, the 2,009-room resort is ideally located to all Orlando has to offer — 1.5 miles from Walt Disney World® and just minutes from SeaWorld® Orlando, Discovery Cove®, Aquatica™ and Universal Studios® Orlando.
Source: Orlando World Center Marriott
